title: Exclusive: BC Partners to buy Com Hem in $2.6 billion deal | Reuters
snippet: Private equity firm BC Partners is set to buy Swedish cable company Com Hem, in a deal that will value the firm at about 17 billion crowns ($2.6 billion), one of the largest buyouts in Europe this year, people familiar with the situation said.
